name: QuiXplorer
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: QuiXplorer is a multi-user, web-based file-manager. It allows you to manage and/or share files over the internet, or an intranet.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<A class="title" href="http:\/\/quixplorer\.sourceforge\.net" target="_blank">QuiXplorer ([^<]+)<\/A> - <A href="http:\/\/quix\.tk" target="_blank">the QuiX project<\/A><\/SMALL>)

matches.text: QuiXplorer - the QuiX project
